About Us

We are a group of passionate engineers & designers working hard to bring the bliss of technology to everyone.

At Uniclick, we just love four leaf clovers :). It represents our values very well. Those are:

Unique

We ensure that what we deliver is unique. We believe to win in this highly competitive market your product must stand out among the clutter of the online jungle.

Simplistic

We follow the simplistic & minimalistic design pattern to ensure it is soothing to the eyes.

Cost-effictive

Cost-effectiveness is a must whatever solution we deliver. You will get the most of your bucks, we guarentee it!

User-friendly

It does not even matter how good your product is if it is hard to use or navigate for your customers. And so we take it as a high priority.

These are our four core values. And we always abide by them.

This mentality makes us highly innovative & proud of what we create, which inevitably makes you the ultimate winner.

So, we want to assure you that your are in good hands. As you succeed, so do we!! We will give it our best.

We believe in IMPACT. We are on a mission to bring the power of technology to everyone.

If you are confused by all the chatter of buzz words like AI, ML, Cloud Computing and want to know how they can help you achieve more, contact us!

We offer consultancy service to everyone fully free, no strings attached. After knowing everything, you can decide for yourself whether to avail our services or not.

We have confidence in our services. So if you are still hesitating, just drop us a mail with your query :)

Services

We provide the following services.

NEARBY WEBSTORE

Do you have a physical store and want to bring it online? Your search ende here. Click to learn more.

ECoaching

Want to bring your coaching institute online without breaking the bank? Check it out! Basic packages starting from just Rs 250/month!

Web Development

Need a custom website for your business? Or want a personalised portfolio website? We are expert in these.

Digital Marketing

Digital marketing might appear simple, but there are lots of psychological aspect in work. Give us a chance, we will show you result.

Android & Web Application

Want a web or android application for your business? Contact us now!

Analytics

Want to monitor user behaviours to drive more sale? We can do that too.

Content Writing

Need someone to write a blog for you? We have professional writers who will be more than happy to help!

Graphics Designing

Our talented designers can provide you quality graphics for your banners, social media posts or maybe you want a logo? Contact us!

Why choose us?

Tll now we have worked with 8 clients & have delivered more than 15 projects.

Strong Core Values

Our values are what defines ourself and makes us superior to our competitors.

Stunning Products!

We take design very seriously. You can easily check it by comparing our portfolio with other companies.

Awesome Technical Support

Once you become our customer we will keep on providing techical support to ensure 100% satisfaction!
